High Priest Maximilian:

I have a special present for you. Look, it's Magic Fire.

I'm sure the item will come in handy, because it helps to fill the Magic Lamp faster.

Oh, are you thinking about places, where you could fill the lamp?

Well, your combat skills are sharpening very fast, that's why I think you are ready to go to new training grounds. That reminds me about one interesting story I have heard lately.
